item.title: Wtf? help!
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Found it, it was a tricky little error :).

When you searched for the bitmap ‘Play’ you used this line:

If(FindBitmap(Play, x+3,y+4))Then MoveMouseSmoothEx(x,y,14,21,15,15,2);

But the x and y in the FindBitmap procedure are variables that the procedure should return the coordinates in. So putting x+3 wouldn’t make sense, altough I see what you were trying to do. You wanted to click a little inside of the left corner of the bitmap. But to do that, you need to change those 2 lines to this:

If(FindBitmap(Play, x,y))Then MoveMouseSmoothEx(x+3,y+4,14,21,15,15,2);

That should do it :).

BTW, thanks for putting me in the credits

-Weibs.

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf? help!
item.dc:creator: @Sebo Sebo
item.description:
@Sebo wrote:

Ok this is weird. I get this error when i try to run my script…

[scar]Line 1: [Error] (1:1): Variable Expected in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\Scripts\RuneScape Window Opener (FIXED).scar[/scar]

And my main script…
[scar]//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
{This Script Is NOT SRLized And will not be working with |
|SRL anytime soon! I still need alot of Basics to be |
|Covered, Thanks, And sorry about that. |
|--------------------------------------------------------}

/////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//-200+ Lines Of script =).User Freindly!----------//
//-Newly Revamped RuneScape Window Opener V [1.1]–//
//-Made By: {SEBO}-----------------------//
//-SETUP ON LINES 64-65!---------------------------//
//-Credits:----------------------------------------//
//-Weibs-------------------------------------------//
//-Go To http://www.scar-army.mypunbb.com/index.php//
//-APS Team----------------------------------------//
//-Kind of Types like a real human!----------------//
//-Will Include SRL Soon =)------------------------//
//-WARNING!WARNING!WARNING!WARNING!WARNING!WARNING!//
//-WARNING!I am NOT responsible for banned WARNING!//
//------------------ACCOUNTS-----------------------//
//-WARNING!WARNING!WARNING!WARNING!WARNING!WARNING!//
//-Accounts! Thanks.-------------------------------//
//-Go To WWW.SCAR-ARMY.MYPUNBB.COM-----------------//
//-------------------------------------------------//
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////
{--------------------------------------------------*
{---------------------------------------------------}
// UB3R Thanks To: Weibs For Teaching Me : --------//
// MULTI-PROCEDURE’S, Im off too More Advanced ----//
// Scripting Thanks To Him, Much <3 ---------------//
// And Kaitneiks For Making A UB3R Program --------//
{---------------------------------------------------}
Program Sebo_Opener;

{-----------------------------------]
| Comment me On Mopar, Username = |
| Sebo (Well Duhhh.) |
[-----------------------------------}

{ |—|
|—|
|—|
-----------
---------/
-------/
-----/
—/
-/
-
Go Down For Setup! }

Var
Play,x,y:Integer;

//////////////////////////////////////////////
Const //Setup// //
UserName = ‘UserName Here’; //Username HERE //
PassWord = ‘PassWord Here’; //Password HERE //
//////////////////////////////////////////////

//--------------------------------------------------------------|
{ Dont Touch Anymore if Your A LEECHER. *
| |
|---------------------------------------------------------------}

Procedure IE_Finder;
Begin
Wait(1543);
If(FindColorTolerance(x,y,15311915,3,4,1019,733,2))Then
MoveMouseSmoothEX(x,y,15,15,15,10,10);
ClickMouse(x,y, True);
ClickMouse(x,y, True);
Wait(3456);
End;

Procedure IE_Tool;
Begin
If(FindColor(x,y,14258485,5,22,971,253))Then
MoveMouseSmoothEX(x,y,15,15,15,10,10);
ClickMouse(x,y, True);
Wait(2500);
End;
Procedure RuneScape;
Begin
SendKeys(‘w’);
Wait(175);
SendKeys(‘w’);
Wait(141);
SendKeys(‘w’);
Wait(165);
SendKeys(’.’);
Wait(61);
SendKeys(‘R’);
Wait(74);
SendKeys(‘u’);
Wait(127);
SendKeys(‘ne’);
Wait(61);
SendKeys(‘Sc’);
Wait(45);
SendKeys(‘a’);
Wait(116);
SendKeys(‘p’);
Wait(215);
SendKeys(‘e’);
Wait(143);
SendKeys(’.’);
Wait(111);
SendKeys(‘co’);
Wait(122);
SendKeys(‘m’+chr(13));
Wait(111);
Wait(3421);
End;

Procedure FindThatGame;
Begin
Play := BitmapFromString(13, 17, ‘z78DAA5935B8E85400844B724’ +
‘D0CFCF7E78F7BFA461284CDA8C1A73E7A74C040F50204F2EBC4DE’ +
‘A398F37DAF75672A8B5C4D84390C64D84076FABBEA7AD3AA4F51C’ +
‘9439859CB671FA9606459FCF349FA20B7390C2BB3EAC8752728A7’ +
‘4EAB0B44F4ECF930692C475A53DE7AF3917D19573F4A6DD56CA33’ +
‘A6DBDE2CF35FBE6DCA9F5ABB91EB779C5E1BA71D53B05D9AF6366’ +
‘97F750FA34BAE20949E9BEE119CC1913A549210D73B57E1D549D7’ +
‘EDD83D382D3151955D2AA70B9AB9FA86F6AB34BC377B7FD99B3AA’ +
‘0B50A8F5B1A360EA6F98FE8052D691623EABA49E4E41CA8B9E475’ +
‘E14C95C9179E6BACEAC6EDAB1373259B1BFCE17C68E06BDFDC07D’ +
‘C249856D7FFB8A1B486E94E3BC57BE4A3A2CDE83956D1A7F83B2F’ +
‘7AB329FCDE6CA7C8591D46D433C13C578463BE8563A73F315724A’ +
‘D’);
//Bitmap Test!//
If(FindBitmap(Play, x+3,y+4))Then
MoveMouseSmoothEx(x,y,14,21,15,15,2);
ClickMouse(x,y, True);
Wait(2500);
If(FindColorTolerance(x,y,66104,556,331,783,449,10))Then
MoveMouseSmoothEX(x,y,15,15,15,10,10);
ClickMouse(x,y, True);
Wait(1500);
FindColor(x,y,2109487,340,246,578,384);
Wait(500);
MoveMouseSmoothEX(x,y,15,15,15,10,10);
ClickMouse(x,y, True);
Wait(2500);
Sleep(20000);
MoveMouseSmoothEx(172,327,15,15,15,10,10);
Wait(1500);
MoveMouseSmoothEx(651,676,15,15,15,10,10);
Wait(654);
MoveMouseSmoothEx(588,476,14,16,15,13,14);
If(FindColor(x,y,5524040,481,440,641,561))Then
MoveMouseSmoothEX(x,y,15,15,15,10,10);
ClickMouse(x,y, True);
Wait(150);
Wait(1500);
If(FindColor(x,y,5918541,347,511,505,570))Then
SendKeys(UserName+chr(13));
Wait(257);
SendKeys(PassWord);
MoveMouseSmoothEX(x,y,15,15,15,10,10);
ClickMouse(x,y, True);
HoldMouse(x,y, True);
Wait(8); //Realistic Human Mouse Click
ReleaseMouse(x,y, True); //Kinda like antiBan =)
Wait(3458);
End;

{--------------------------------------------------------]
[The Script Will Hide itself to make it look like it’s a ]
[Human or a GHOST! Oooohhh, Spooky! ]
[--------------------------------------------------------}
Procedure credits;
begin
Writeln(’<========================================================>’)
WriteLn(’ Thanks for using Sebos’)
WriteLn(’ RuneScape Window Opener.’)
WriteLn(‘Another thanks to MJordan for the credits =)’)
WriteLn(‘For the person / People, who made the F1 Thing’)
WriteLn(‘And Most Of All Thanks To Kaitnieks For Creating SCAR!’)
WriteLn(’<========================================================>’)
end;

{-----------------}
{| Main Script |}
{-----------------}
///////////////////
//-DONT TOUCH----//
///////////////////

////////////////////////////////////////////
Begin //
Start_Script:=ReadLn(‘Start Script?’); //
WriteLn(Start_Script); //
Writeln(‘You said ‘+Start_Script+’ Starting Anyways’);
GetSelf.HIDE; //
ActivateClient; //
WriteLn(‘Enjoi My script, Thanks.’); //
WriteLn(‘SCAR OwNzZ!’); //
IE_Finder; //
IE_Tool; //
RuneScape; //
FindThatGame; //
WriteLn(’////////////////’); //
WriteLn(’//-GO SEBO!—//’); //
WriteLn(’////////////////’); //
Credits; //
GetSelf.SHOW; // //
{—Oh Yeah!—} //
End. //
////////////////////////////////////////////[/scar]
